segments.text: Good afternoon . Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to check in .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my name is Steven Smith . I have a reservation from October 2nd to October 6th . I called last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wait a moment , please . Oh , yes , Steven Smith . It's for a single room with a bath . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now , Mr . Smith , could you fill out this registration form , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . By the way , where is the restaurant ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The restaurant is on the second floor . Here is the key to your room . It's on the 6th floor , room 609 . The elevator is over there . And we also have a cafeteria on the top floor , if you would like something to drink , you can also call room service .
segments.speaker: S1
